channel.title: GUI on IdlePhysicist

item.title: Fuelometer
item.description: Fuelometer Repo I wanted to keep track of my fuel consumption so I wrote a little app to do it. It’s my first GUI application, using PyQt5. I store the data in a SQLite database. Note there are three branches of the code, this is only a prototype there will be bugs & the numbers may be invalid!
